In addition we deliver regular public courses through JB International and the Royal Statistical Society. I‚Äôm also a visiting lecturer at Birmingham City University.

title: Training
text:
R in 3 Months






I‚Äôm particularly proud of my work as a co-instructor on the excellent R in 3 Months course that runs twice a year in the Spring and Fall.
The course includes weekly assignments where students use their own datasets and I record personalised feedback videos for each student. Over the course of the 12 weeks students build up a solid understanding of R and how to use RMarkdown to create rich and easy to read reports.
The course is $999 or $399 for those in countries with lower GDPs.








This course was designed and is co-taught by David Keyes from the wonderful R for the Rest of Us consultancy. I‚Äôm very pleased to also collaborate with the diverse R for the Rest of Us on various consultancy projects.

Mapping with R ($99)





I‚Äôve designed this course specifically for folks who‚Äôve never built a map or worked with GIS datasets before. The course introduces you to the excellent {sf} package and how to use it alongside the tidyverse for wrangling and exploring spatial data.
You‚Äôll then learn how to create static maps with {ggplot2} and interactive maps with {leaflet}. I‚Äôll also ensure you go away with sufficiency knowledge to work with projections, CRS and where to obtain shapefiles.
This course is available through the excellent R for the Rest of Us course catalogue.

title: Training
text:
Public courses


I partner with JB International to deliver monthly scheduled public R courses.  JB International have 20+ years experience in hosting and organising corporate training courses - but we also often see academics in these public courses too. Public courses are an affordable choice and an excellent opportunity to learn alongside other folks. If you‚Äôd prefer a bespoke course, please see below.
I also deliver 3 courses a year through the Royal Statistical Society.  These courses are attended equally by both academics and folks from industry. This happens to be the most cost effective way to attend our courses, for non-RSS members attendance is ¬£693.60 + VAT.

text:
Custom training courses

Our training courses focus on using the R language for data science, reporting or data visualisation. Our courses are delivered using RMardown lecture slides for foundational material and use live coding exercises to replicate the real-world experience of using R.We encourage learners to tell us:
‚Äúwe need that chart/dashboard to do X‚Äù
or
‚Äúthat‚Äôs not good enough for our needs - we need Y‚Äù
I‚Äôd recommend considering booking a bespoke course through our partner JB International. They‚Äôve been working with both small and (very) large corporates since 1995 and are better suited to processing payments and booking requests than my small consultancy. I genuinely enjoy working with these folks - they‚Äôre very fair to me and to their customers.If you would prefer to get in touch directly with me, then please email me at charlie@visibledata.co.uk.
